fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Give two players citizenship at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If either of your targets are Town Support, they will both gain a charge of a random GIM Town Investigative role.
- If either of your targets are Town Protective, they will both be granted Powerful Defense for two nights. They will know about this.
- If either of your targets are Town Investigative, they will both be revealed a role besides each other or The President that is still alive.
- If either of your targets are Town Killing, they will both be granted a 1-shot Vigi shot that they must use the next night or they lose it. If they kill a Town, they will be roleblocked for two nights after.
- If either of your are targets are Town Power, they will both be roleblocked. The one that isn't Town Power will be roleblocked the next night as well.
- If either of your targets are Town Casual, all visits on them tonight and tomorrow night will be prevented, excluding your visit and if they visit each other.

fields.name: Attributes (cont.):
fields.value:
- If either of your targets are not Town, you will be converted into a Citizen after 2 nights, and your ability is canceled for this night.
- You may not give yourself citizenship.
- You are roleblock immune.
